title: End-to-end test
description:
Verify ticker can complete an epic autonomously.

Create a test epic with 2-3 simple tasks:
- Create a file
- Modify the file
- Add a test

Run: ticker run <test-epic> --max-iterations 10

Verify:
- All tasks closed in ticks
- Files created/modified correctly
- Commits made with proper format
- Iteration notes added to epic
- COMPLETE signal detected
- Exit code 0

Document any issues found for follow-up.
